content: As an AI language model, I do not have opinions, nor do I have access to the latest data on the performance of ferry companies in your area. However, you can look for online reviews and ratings from customers who have used these ferry companies. You can also check their safety records and compliance with regulations set by regulatory authorities in your area. This information can help you make an informed decision on which ferry company to use. It's always a good practice to choose a reputable and reliable ferry company with a good safety track record.
